news_header: Heathrow Airport served 83.9 million passengers in 2024, a record high, and plans to invest over £1bn for future improvements.
news_text: In 2024, Heathrow Airport recorded 83.9 million passengers, surpassing 2023's figures by 4.7 million and exceeding the previous record from 2019 by 3 million. The airport anticipates serving 84.2 million passengers in 2025 and is set to invest over £1 billion this year to enhance its facilities. CEO Thomas Woldbye expressed pride in the team's efforts to improve passenger experiences and emphasized the commitment to providing better value for customers in the future.
